meanings.sent1: The brunchers gathered at the cafe for a delicious meal.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of brunchers enjoying their food at the restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The brunchers were so hungry, they almost ate the menu!
meanings.sent4: The brunchers were like a flock of birds descending on the buffet.
meanings.sent5: The brunchers' laughter filled the room as they shared stories over pancakes.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals who enjoy brunch together.
meanings.sent1: Our friends are the best brunchers; they always pick great spots to eat.
meanings.sent2: The brunchers chatted happily as they sipped on mimosas.
meanings.sent3: The brunchers decided to have a pancake flipping contest for fun.
meanings.sent4: The brunchers' friendship was as strong as their love for eggs Benedict.
meanings.sent5: The brunchers' tradition of trying new dishes made every Sunday exciting.
